mapper.select: SELECT NO_NO, NOS_NAME, TITLE, NODATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, DATA.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO "NO_NO", NOTICE_TITLE "TITLE", NOTICESORT_NAME "NOS_NAME", TO_CHAR(NOTICE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS NODATE, NOTICESORT_NO AS "NOS_NO" FROM VIEW_NOTICE ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC ) DATA ) WHERE RNUM >=#{start} AND RNUM <= #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NO_NO, AD_ID, NOS_NO, TITLE, CONTENT, NODATE) VALUES(NOTICESEQ.NEXTVAL, #{ad_id}, #{nos_no}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM VIEW_NOTICE
